pull.title: depends: update freetype and document remaining `bitcoin-qt` runtime libs
pull.body:
Update freetype to `2.11.1`.
Updating fontconfig (currently `2.12.6`) to `2.13.1` requires what looks like a hard dep on gperf; leaving that as-is for now.
Document expectations in `symbol-check.py`.
Closes #29977 (changes are based on discussion there).

events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Code Coverage & Benchmarks For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/33952. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [sedited](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33952#pullrequestreview-3541144045) | | Concept ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33952#pullrequestreview-3512059986) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.

tree a3b5d80e6bd7c9e85347ac1954b34eb2cfde3df4
parent 808f1d972be35f4c66bdc30ab0f4064dab0c43c0

tree 0cc5ddeeeb530c7848fcd4eabe8657735b0d5217
parent ef4ce19a1545d81dcf95b07e04628557a57451e2
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1764171980 +0000
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1764255940 +0000

guix: add bitcoin-qt runtime libs doc in symbol-check

libfreetype and libfontconfig are our two remaining runtime libs for
bitcoin-qt. According to #29977 Ubuntu 22.04 should be considered the
baseline for what is supported. Document that.

Closes #29977.

events.message:
guix: add bitcoin-qt runtime libs doc in symbol-check

libfreetype and libfontconfig are our two remaining runtime libs for
bitcoin-qt. According to #29977 Ubuntu 22.04 should be considered the
baseline for what is supported. Document that.

Closes #29977.
